<html><DIV id=cdiv>
<P>Wildfire: <BR><BR><BR><BR><BR>Wildfire shot the image of a roaring fire at KitKat to fight off her rage. That image was her threat in return. <BR><BR><EM>All right!</EM> she shouted back. <EM>I do something for your presious little snake-bot! </EM>She turned her head back to Quickstrike and made a growling noise. Who were these females, his herum? 
<P>She scooted closer to the odd little bot, and settled deep into his mind, throwing aside the blanknes that he had. There was something behind that wall. She got horible images. A dragon, fire, hatred, a killing passion---
<P>Wildfire hissed and backed up. She broke the transfer. 
<P><EM>Little fool!</EM></P></DIV><p><hr>Get Your Private, Free E-mail from MSN Hotmail at <a href="http://www.hotmail.com/">http://www.hotmail.com</a><br></html>
